name: Campground Owner
description:
Take on the role of campground owner - buy parcels, place buildings. Show your guests where they can pitch a tent or place a caravan! Organize technical facilities.
Small, simple, and uncomplicated business.
Real-time tycoon-like game with minimalistic systems.

Features

  • Relaxing mood
  • Simple, intuitive game mechanics
  • Creative mode (ignore finances)
  • Procedurally generated maps
